QuestData.Title: Precious Roots
QuestData.Description:
Korthia. A sister forest, stricken.
But in the throes of destruction, there is still hope.
Gather the anima, and build anew.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $1oa Residual Anima from around the Vault in Korthia.
QuestData.RewardText: Precious anima that will be shared. A sacrifice, honored.
